title: recipes_Barbequed_Steak
text:
Title: Barbequed Steak.
.
Description: A tender cut like Porterhouse, T-Bone, Rib Eye, New York or Top Sirloin are all good steaks for this simple marinade. Serve with a dollop of garlic butter, if desired..
.
Ingredients:.
- 4 (1/2 pound) beef top sirloin steaks.
- 0.5 cup vegetable oil.
- 1 ounce steak spice seasoning mix.
.
Instructions:.
- Put oil and steak spice on a large enough platter to accommodate the steaks. Coat the steak well with the oil and spices..
- Preheat an outdoor grill for high heat and lightly oil grate.
- Grill steaks over high heat to desired doneness..
.
Nutrients:.
calories: 302 kcal.
carbohydrateContent: 1 g.
cholesterolContent: 61 mg.
fiberContent: 0 g.
proteinContent: 19 g.
saturatedFatContent: 5 g.
sodiumContent: 719 mg.
fatContent: 24 g.
servingSize: 4 (1/2 pound) steaks.
unsaturatedFatContent: 0 g.
.
Serves: 8 servings.
